T02D2682a:206a-24: shes par byed pa'i bar ni /

T02D2682a:206a-27: sgo ba dang sgrub thabs bstan zin to /

T02D2682a:206a-32: sgrub thams dang cho ga'i bye brag ston pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2682a:206a-33: sdig pa thams cad byang byas nas /

T02D2682a:206a-38: de nas bsri zhing bsgom pa'i tshe /
T02D2682a:206a-39: bar chad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gshegs pa'i don no //
T02D2682a:206a-40: rgyud kyi don la 'jug pa'i phyir /
T02D2682a:206a-41: sdig pa thams cad byang bar bya ba ni /

T02D2682a:206a-47: sdig pa'i rnam grangs chos la bdag tu lta ba dang /
T02D2682a:206a-48: gang zag la bdag tu lta ba dang /
T02D2682a:206b-0: sgo lnga'i @206b yal la las kyis zhen pa'i bag chags kun gzhi la bsgribs pa dang /
T02D2682a:206b-1: sngon gyi bag chags da ltar smin pa dang /
T02D2682a:206b-2: dngos po la zhen pa'i bdag tu lta ba dang /

T02D2682a:206b-16: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi don ma nor bar bstan cing /

T02D2682a:206b-20: gang du gsungs pa bzhin byas nas 'bras bu chud mi za ba'i phyir smos so //
T02D2682a:206b-21: sdug bsngal thams cad med par byed //
T02D2682a:206b-23: de skad gsungs zhes pa'i bar ni /

T02D2682a:206b-27: sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang /
T02D2682a:206b-29: sdug bsngal brgyad kyang spong ste /

T02D2682a:206b-35: gnyan byams pa dang bral gyis dogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
T02D2682a:206b-36: yod pa med par dogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
T02D2682a:206b-37: med pa mi rnyed pa'i sdug bsngal lo //
T02D2682a:206b-38: de'i 'og tu rgyud thams cad kyi rtsa ba'i don ston te ni /

T02D2682a:206b-40: rgyud do cog gi rtsa ba ste //
T02D2682a:206b-42: don gyi rtsa bar gsungs zhes pa'i bar ni /
T02D2682a:206b-44: rtsa ba byang chub sems dpas rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02D2682a:207a-0: 'jig rten las 'das pa dbyer med pa'i dkyil 'khor @207a * //
T02D2682a:207a-3: bskal bzangs dang phyi nang lha mo dang /
T02D2682a:207a-4: bkra shis kyi rtags brgyad dang /
T02D2682a:207a-9: sgo ba rnams bri pa'i don no //
T02D2682a:207a-10: de'i 'og tu yang rgyud kyi don gyis dpal gyi gzhir 'gyur ba ni /
T02D2682a:207a-11: de bzhin gshegs pas 'di gsungs na rdo rje gdan
T02D2682a:207a-12: la gshegs pa'i tshe bdud la rtags brgyad sku la
T02D2682a:207a-14: dpal kun gyis ni legs par brgyan //
T02D2682a:207a-16: legs par brgyan zhes pa'i bar ni sku ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor te /

T02D2682a:207a-19: thugs khro bo'i dkyil 'khor la rtags brgyad bri ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2682a:207a-20: de'i 'og tu sems can dbang po nyams pa la
T02D2682a:207a-21: phan pa'i thabs ni dbang po nyams pa'i snga ltas
T02D2682a:207a-22: bco brgyad gso pa'i don te /
T02D2682a:207a-23: sems can dbang po nyams pa dang //
T02D2682a:207a-25: 'byang bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'i bar ni /
T02D2682a:207a-31: yid kyi dbang po nyams pa dang /
T02D2682a:207a-38: chos rnams kyang mi gsal bas nyams te /
T02D2682a:207a-39: de'i rgyu bzhi mi mthun te /
T02D2682a:207a-44: de'i rkyen gyis na ba dang /
T02D2682a:207a-45: 'chi ba'i snga ltas byung ba de bzlog pa'i thabs so //
T02D2682a:207a-46: de'i 'og tu tshe nyams pa gso ba'i thabs te /
T02D2682a:207a-53: tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams pa //
T02D2682a:207a-55: sos par gsungs kyi bar du /
T02D2682a:207a-56: tshe nyams pa'i lnga ltas rnam pa lnga ste /
T02D2682a:207a-64: 'byung ba bzhi dus dang lnga gyur pa dang /
T02D2682a:207a-66: de'i 'og tu dogs pa nyams pa gso pa'i thabs ni /
T02D2682a:207a-67: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams cho ga rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg tshul bzhin bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
T02D2682a:207a-68: phun sum tshogs min gang chags dang //
T02D2682a:207b-0: phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i thabs zhes @207b pa'i bar ni /
T02D2682a:207b-1: rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg bya ba'i thabs /
T02D2682a:207b-3: bsreg rdzas rnams tshang bar bya ba dang /
T02D2682a:207b-4: gzhung gzhan nas 'byung ba dag tu sa stegs brtsigs la /
T02D2682a:207b-5: thams cad kha dog ser po byas la /
T02D2682a:207b-6: gang la las byas pa'i sems can gyi ming dang /
T02D2682a:207b-7: lha'i sngags spel zhing las byas na rgyas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2682a:207b-8: de'i 'og tu nyon mongs pa'i phyogs kyis 'jig rten
T02D2682a:207b-9: dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha'i mi dga' ba
T02D2682a:207b-10: ston pa ni / thugs khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2682a:207b-11: phyi rol du lha brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor bris nas
T02D2682a:207b-13: lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang /

T02D2682a:207b-18: gzhung gzhan nas rgyas par 'byung ba bzhin du rgyas

T02D2682a:207b-25: 'grub par gsungs zhes pa'i bar ni /

T02D2682a:207b-28: snying du sdug pa'i bu smad dang /
T02D2682a:207b-29: yongs kyi skye bo rnams la sdang ba'i rnam pa med par 'gyur ro //
T02D2682a:207b-30: de'i 'og tu 'khor ba gnod pa ste /
T02D2682a:207b-31: bsod nams can gyi sems can bsod nams zad du nye ba na /

T02D2682a:207b-36: bram ze la sogs gtses pa dang /
T02D2682a:207b-38: de'i 'og tu mi mthun pa ston pa ni /
T02D2682a:207b-39: sems can de dag las kyi bag chags gdon gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mthus /
T02D2682a:207b-40: phan tshun dgra bo lta bur byed pas /
T02D2682a:207b-42: lha'i sngags bsre zhing las byas na /
T02D2682a:207b-44: phan thun mthun pa ma yin dang /
T02D2682a:207b-46: de'i 'og tu dogs pa nyams pa ston te ni /
T02D2682a:207b-47: sems can rnams sngon gyi bsod nams zad pa'i snga ltas ni /
T02D2682a:207b-48: bdog pa'i nor rdzas dang 'brel te /
T02D2682a:208a-0: shin tu phongs pas sdug bsngal ba la rgyas @208a * //
T02D2682a:208a-1: pa'i las byas na 'grub pa'i phyir na /
T02D2682a:208a-2: nor 'gribs pas ni gnod pa dang //
T02D2682a:208a-4: de'i 'og tu mya ngan gyis gnod pa ston te ni /
T02D2682a:208a-5: sems de dag gdon gyis gnod pas byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D2682a:208a-6: sems sdug bsngal gyis gnod pas mya ngan skyes pas
T02D2682a:208a-7: lus thang chad nas ngal ba'i sdug bsngal ba de

T02D2682a:208a-9: mya ngan ngal dang gnod pa dang //

T02D2682a:208a-22: 'jigs pa dang ni phongs pa dang //

T02D2682a:208a-30: gza' dang rgyu skar byad stems dang //

T02D2682a:208a-33: gdon stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rnams /

T02D2682a:208a-36: gdon gyi gtso bo phyogs skyong ba bcu'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2682a:208a-37: gyi dbus su khro bo rnams rab tu bkod la

T02D2682a:208a-39: sbyin sreg dag tshul bzhin du byas te /

T02D2682a:208a-42: zhes gsungs pa'i tha tshig go //

T02D2682a:208a-45: mthur brtas pa'i sdig pa'i snga ltas kyi rmi lam
T02D2682a:208a-47: de yang mdo 'di gsungs pa'i tshe /

T02D2682a:208b-0: bdud kyi @208b gnas thams cad mog mog por byas nas /
T02D2682a:208b-1: bdud kyi rmi lam ltas ngan sum cu rtsa gnyis
T02D2682a:208b-2: rmis pa dag / zhib tu rgya cher rol pa

T02D2682a:208b-5: cho ga'i thabs kyis zhi bar byed pas na /
T02D2682a:208b-6: mya ngan ngal las byung pa yi //
T02D2682a:208b-7: rmi lam sdig pa mthong na yang /
T02D2682a:208b-8: zhes gsungs pa'i tha tshig go //
T02D2682a:208b-9: de'i 'og tu cho ga'i thabs ston te /

T02D2682a:208b-11: mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya /
T02D2682a:208b-13: lha ngo bo bstan pa'i tha tshig go zhes pa'i bar ni /

T02D2682a:208b-15: slob ma la bum pa byin gyis brlabs pa der /
T02D2682a:208b-16: slob ma la sogs pa'i yon bdag dag par khrus
T02D2682a:208b-17: byas nas phyi nang gi dri ma rnams rab tu

T02D2682a:208b-21: dkyil 'khor du gzhug cing lha'i ngo bstan cing /

T02D2682a:208b-26: nang gi sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs pa /

T02D2682a:208b-29: gtsang ma'i gos kyis rab brgyan te //

T02D2682a:208b-35: dpon rigs gsum gyi sangs rgyas 'dra bar lta ba

T02D2682a:208b-39: dam tshig rnam pa de lnga dang ldan pa yang /
T02D2682a:208b-40: yid dge ba rnam pa bcu ste /
T02D2682a:208b-41: lus kyi rnam pa gsum dang /
T02D2682a:208b-42: ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dang /
T02D2682a:208b-43: yid kyi rnam pa gsum dang ldan pas /

T02D2682a:209a-0: slob dpon gyi lung ji skad gsungs pa @209a * //
T02D2682a:209a-1: bzhin bgyid pas bka' blo bde la /

T02D2682a:209a-6: sems kyi dri ma'i skyon rab tu gsal te /

T02D2682a:209a-13: slob ma'i lus dkon mchog mchod pa'i phyir dad pas
T02D2682a:209a-14: rgyan gyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes par bya
T02D2682a:209a-16: de'i 'og tu theg pa chen po'i chos nyan pa'i
T02D2682a:209a-17: yon tan bstan cing skul ma gdab ste zhes pa

T02D2682a:209a-20: ni / te / dang por chos ma nor bar ston pa'i mkhan po smra ba bsten pa dang /
T02D2682a:209a-21: gnyis pa de las chos nyan pa dang /
T02D2682a:209a-22: gsum pa yid la 'jog pa dang /
T02D2682a:209a-23: bzhi pa gzhan la bstan pa'i phan yon ston pa'o //
T02D2682a:209a-24: zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba //
T02D2682a:209a-25: mdo sde 'di ni nyan byed na //
T02D2682a:209a-27: slob ma la bstan zhes pa'i par ni /
T02D2682a:209a-30: ma byon pa thams cad kyis thugs ye shes kyi rtags /
T02D2682a:209a-31: mdo sde 'di don zab la rgya che ba //

T02D2682a:209a-33: rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas /
T02D2682a:209a-34: 'di'i don gzhan la nyam pa dang /

T02D2682a:209a-38: gus pa'i dad pas nyams su len pa'i don dag rgyas par bstan pa'i don ni /

T02D2682a:209a-41: blo rno zhing shes rab che ba dang /
